QAPair.Question: What is (are) Streptococcal screen ?
QAPair.Answer: A streptococcal screen is a test to detect group A streptococcus. This type of bacteria is the most common cause of strep throat .

QAPair.Question: Who is at risk for Streptococcal screen? ?
What to do for Streptococcal screen ?
QAPair.Answer: This test screens for the group A streptococcus bacteria only. It will not detect other causes of sore throat.
